docs.text: Description ¶ This website will soon contain some (hopefully) useful tips and tricks how to configure your Atom text editor. Contact ¶ For questions or comments please create a new issue e-mail Lennart Wittkuhn

docs.title: Description

docs.text: For questions or comments please create a new issue e-mail Lennart Wittkuhn
docs.title: Contact

docs.text: Atom + virtual environment ¶ Create an ipykernel for your virtuial envionment workon thisenv python -m ipykernel install --user --name thisenv The result will be: Installed kernelspec thisenv in /Users/wittkuhn/Library/Jupyter/kernels/thisenv Re-start Atom / re-start project When launching the Hydrogen kernel select thisenv as your environment References ¶ https://github.com/nteract/hydrogen/issues/899
docs.title: Environments

docs.text: Create an ipykernel for your virtuial envionment workon thisenv python -m ipykernel install --user --name thisenv The result will be: Installed kernelspec thisenv in /Users/wittkuhn/Library/Jupyter/kernels/thisenv Re-start Atom / re-start project When launching the Hydrogen kernel select thisenv as your environment
